name: Iron Man Figure
description: Unleash your inner superhero with this highly-detailed Iron Man action figure. With articulated joints and premium craftsmanship, this figure brings the iconic Avenger to life.

name: Captain America Figure
description: Assemble the Avengers with this Captain America action figure. Featuring his signature shield and heroic pose, it's perfect for fans of the First Avenger.

name: Darth Vader Figure
description: Join the dark side with this highly-detailed Darth Vader action figure. With his iconic lightsaber and menacing presence, it's a must-have for Star Wars enthusiasts.

name: Optimus Prime Figure
description: Experience the battle between Autobots and Decepticons with this impressive Optimus Prime action figure. Transform it from robot to vehicle mode for epic playtime adventures.
